summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the northerly portion of West Ewing Street from the east margin of 3rd Avenue West to the west margin of 8th Avenue West, all in the City of Seattle by constructing a 14-foot plank roadway thereon, all in accordance with Resolution No. 912 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
